name: Vangelis Kanelloupou
personality: Determined and loyal to his cause, but often stubborn and argumentative
story: Born and raised in the mountainous areas of Greece, Vangelis grew up surrounded by stories of Greek nationalism and anti-authority sentiment. He joined the military as soon as he came of age, eager to fight for what he believed in. He quickly worked his way up the ranks, becoming a skilled Autorifleman in the process. Despite his brash and confrontational personality, Vangelis has earned the respect of his fellow soldiers through his dedication to his comrades and unwavering commitment to their cause.
